chapters.title: Chapter 1:  To Keep the Bargain
chapters.info: Sumeko Karistovan, p. 58 (52)—One of the Kin. She is a very skilled Healer, and has developed methods of Healing that not even Nynaeve has been able to develop—in fact, the only thing similar would be the methods Damer Flinn has developed among the Asha'man. She is possibly the most skilled female Healer alive outside of Semirhage. She is stout.
